title: Team Looking for MID lamer Gold
body:
We are looking of a Mid Laner for our ranked team. We are looking for a dedicated player. 
Please answer the following and send me an in game message in League. My  in game name is Ever 002
 IGN: 
season 4 rank :
season 5 rank:
5 favorite champs:
Why do you want to join a ranked 5s team?
Do you have a microphone?

replies.body:
IGN: InventDestiny
season 4 rank : Gold 2
season 5 rank: Plat 5
5 favorite champs: TF, Veigar, Syndra, Vel Koz, Zed
Why do you want to join a ranked 5s team? I like to have team mates I can rely on, and having a constant practice schedule
Do you have a microphone? yes

IGN: Pentacidal
season 4 rank : plat 4
season 5 rank: gold 4
5 favorite champs: ziggs xerath ahri zed ANNIE (also very comfortable on marksmen mids like luc ez and corki)
Why do you want to join a ranked 5s team? i crave a more competitive environment than solo queue and love working with teammates
Do you have a microphone? Yes

IGN: Coldpheonix
season 4 rank : G1
season 5 rank: G2
5 favorite champs: LeBlanc. Zed, Ahri, Lissandra, Lulu
Why do you want to join a ranked 5s team? I enjoy the strategic part of LoL much more than the stupidity of solo queue.
Do you have a microphone? Yes

IGN: Santenkesshun
season 4 rank : Highest P2
season 5 rank: G2
5 favorite champs: Ziggs, Mordekaiser, Zed, Talon, Nidalee
Why do you want to join a ranked 5s team? I want to immerse myself back into the competitive 5s world
Do you have a microphone? Yep

season 4 rank : Silver 4
season 5 rank: Currently Silver 4
5 favorite champs: Azir, Cassiopeia, Zed, Ahri, Viktor
Why do you want to join a ranked 5s team? Looking to improve as a player with a positive group of players and to grow with a team into the ranks
Do you have a microphone? Yes along with ts3, skype, vent, etc.

IGN: Xacha0
season 4 rank : S2
season 5 rank: S2
5 favorite champs: Ahri, Velkoz, Zed, Leblanc, Xerath
Why do you want to join a ranked 5s team? To Improve
Do you have a microphone? Yes

IGN: **ImTryingToLearn**
season 4 rank : **Gold 4**
season 5 rank: **Plat 5 **(just elo decayed back to gold 1)
5 favorite champs: **Xerath, Leblanc, Ahri, Zed, Nidalee**
Why do you want to join a ranked 5s team?: **Ranked 5's is my favorite part of league.**
Do you have a microphone?:** Yes**
